title: Bug 118780 - Set alias for columns in dataset but expression builder still shows the old column names
OB: The original name of the first column is listed in the expression builder below, instead of using the alias name.
EB: According to SCR 78193, the expression builder should display the alias name of the first column when selected, not the original name.
SR: Bug 118780 - Set alias for columns in dataset but expression builder still shows the old column names
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset.
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
5. Double click on the first column name.
